description:
Create a simulation parameter object that carries a complete set of Urban Weather
Genreator (UWG) simulation settings and can be plugged into the "DF Run Urban
Weather Generator" component.
-

outputs.name: sim_par
outputs.description:
A UWG SimulationParameter object that can be connected to the
"DF Run Urban Weather Generator" component in order to specify
UWG simulation settings

name: DF UWG Simulation Parameter

inputs.name: _run_period_
inputs.description:
A Ladybug Analysis Period object to describe the time period over
which to run the simulation. If None, the simulation will be run for
the whole year.

inputs.name: _timestep_
inputs.description:
An integer for the number of timesteps per hour at which the
calculation will be run. (Default: 12).

inputs.name: _veg_par_
inputs.description:
A VegetationParameter object to specify the behavior of vegetation
in the urban area. If None, generic vegetation parameters will be
generated.

inputs.name: _epw_site_
inputs.description:
A ReferenceEPWSite object to specify the properties of the
reference site where the input rural EPW was recorded. If None,
generic airport properties will be generated.

inputs.name: _bnd_layer_
inputs.description:
A BoundaryLayerParameter to specify the properties of the urban
boundary layer. If None, generic boundary layer parameters will
be generated.
